node.title: How do I install the EcoCart browser extension?
node.content:
1) Follow this link to install EcoCart on Chrome.
2) Click on Add to Chrome and then Add extension in the pop up window.
3) Create an account with an email/password, or with one-click using Google or Facebook

4) That‚Äôs it! Now just shop like normal and you‚Äôll be able to make your online orders carbon neutral!

node.title: How does EcoCart work with ad blockers?
node.content:
To make sure you earn your EcoPoints, we need to validate your purchase by communicating with the store where you made your transaction. Certain ad blocker settings prevent us from doing so.

If you‚Äôre finding trouble using EcoCart alongside your ad blocker, simply disable your ad blocker while you shop and re-enable it once you‚Äôre finished.

node.title: You don‚Äôt have any stores I like üòû
node.content:
We‚Äôre constantly adding new stores that support sustainable shopping. If you‚Äôre looking for a particular store, let us know and we‚Äôll get them on board! Just click the contact us button in the bottom right of the screen, or write to us at hello@ecocart.io.

¬†

node.title: How can I find stores to shop sustainably?
node.content:
EcoCart offers a few ways to find stores that support sustainable shopping. With the extension installed, you can:

  1. Just shop like normal and EcoCart will notify you when you‚Äôre in a store that supports carbon neutral shopping.
  2. When you search for stores on Google, participating stores will say ‚ÄúShop Sustainably‚Äù next to the website name.

Or you can browse participating stores in the extension by clicking on the EcoCart plane icon on Chrome. You‚Äôll see stores that are offering the most EcoPoints on the home tab and stores that are trending with other EcoCart users on the search tab. Or you can search for stores by name on the search tab.

node.title: What information does EcoCart collect?
node.content: We only collect information that we believe can help you accurately offset the carbon impact of your online orders. If you choose to register as a member, you can provide your name, email, and other general profile information. Like most other web services, EcoCart collects technical information about your device and how you use EcoCart to make sure that our products are working right, to help calculate the carbon emissions generated by your order(s), and to detect and prevent fraud.¬†

node.title: What do you do with my data?
node.content: We will do not and will never sell your data. Unlike other online shopping browser extensions, we‚Äôre in the business of saving the planet, not violating your privacy. We promise to never give your data to third-parties. We‚Äôll only use your data in ways you‚Äôd expect, like improving our customer experience, which we explain in our privacy policy.

node.title: Are you a non-profit?
node.content: We intentionally opted not to form a non-profit entity because it limits how EcoCart can operate. For example, if we were a non-profit, we wouldn‚Äôt be able to take outside investment for EcoCart, which would limit our velocity and growth, thus hindering our impact on the planet. We‚Äôre on a mission to make all commerce carbon neutral and if we were a non-profit, we would be limited in our impact.

node.title: How does EcoCart make money?
node.content: When you activate EcoCart on one of our partner stores and checkout, we receive a commission that we use to fund certified carbon offset projects on your behalf.¬†

node.title: I‚Äôm not receiving my rewards
node.content:
We deliver your rewards via email, so make sure you check your spam and promotional folders to make sure our email didn‚Äôt slip through the cracks.

When you collect enough EcoPoints to earn a reward, we‚Äôll deliver them to you via email (it‚Äôs better for the planet that way). To make sure that happens, we recommend:

Gmail users‚Äîmove EcoCart to your primary inbox

  • On your phone? Hit the 3 dots at the top right corner, click ‚ÄúMove to‚Äù then ‚ÄúPrimary‚Äù
  • On desktop? Back out of this email then drag and drop this email into the ‚ÄúPrimary‚Äù tab near the top left of your screen

Apple mail users‚Äîtap on our email address at the top of this email (next to ‚ÄúFrom:‚Äù on mobile) and click ‚ÄúAdd to VIPs‚Äù

Everyone else‚Äîfollow these instructions

node.title: Redeeming EcoPoints
node.content:
Once you have accumulated enough EcoPoints to earn a reward, go to the EcoCart extension > Account tab > EcoPoints tab.

Then, select your reward, click redeem, and an email will be sent to you with information about the project you‚Äôre contributing to or your e-gift card. You‚Äôll only be able to redeem rewards you have enough EcoPoints for.¬†
